title: George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Living Room
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and brown and  green gouache, graphite on illustration board, ruled border in graphite
description: Design for a streamlined interior showing living room and partial view of dining room.  A curving glass block wall with built-in banquette and L-shaped built-in sofa, with glass-topped table in front, delimit living room corner. A fireplace set in low dado and upholstered arm chair comprise remainder of living room interior.  At lower right is partial view of Deskey-designed grand piano.  At upper right, marked off by curtain at left and glass block wall at right, view into dining room with Deskey sideboard and dining table.  Linoleum floor with graphic double line in white running from fireplace around sofa into and around dining room.
name: Drawing
